pkgmetadata.longdescription: Krippendorff's Alpha for Multi-Valued Data // Calculate Krippendorff's alpha for multi-valued data using the methods introduced by Krippendorff and Craggs (2016) doi:10.1080/19312458.2016.1228863. Nominal, ordinal, interval, and ratio data types are supported, with options to create bootstrapped estimates of alpha and/or parallelize calculations.
